scripts.install:lint: npm install --save-dev babel-eslint@^4.1.x eslint@^1.10.x eslint-plugin-nodeca@^1.0.x eslint-plugin-react@^3.15.x
scripts.install:tdd: npm install --save-dev chai@^3.4.x karma@^0.13.x karma-chai@^0.1.x karma-es5-shim@0.0.x karma-mocha@^0.2.x karma-phantomjs-launcher@^0.2.x karma-sinon@^1.0.x karma-webpack@^1.7.x mocha@^2.3.x phantomjs@^1.9.x sinon@^1.17.x karma-sourcemap-loader@^0.3.x
scripts.install:dev: npm install && npm install chai@^3.4.x karma@^0.13.x karma-chai@^0.1.x karma-es5-shim@0.0.x karma-mocha@^0.2.x karma-phantomjs-launcher@^0.2.x karma-sinon@^1.0.x karma-webpack@^1.7.x mocha@^2.3.x phantomjs@^1.9.x sinon@^1.17.x karma-sourcemap-loader@^0.3.x && npm install isparta-loader@^2.0.x karma-coverage@^0.5.x istanbul-instrumenter-loader@^0.1.x babel-eslint@^4.1.x eslint@^1.10.x eslint-plugin-nodeca@^1.0.x eslint-plugin-react@^3.15.x
scripts.install:full: npm install && npm run install-lint && npm run install-tdd && npm run install-cov
